attributes.action: Martin Lawrence describes the fuel hike as "disgusting ". Find an alternative!
attributes.additional_details:
Intervene - the hike needs to be absorbed by fuel companies
Remove VAT - we as a public are struggling with NI hike and the  cost of living. Many of us are still reeling from the lockdown.
attributes.background:
Ordinary folk shouldn't have to choose between staying warm or eating. 
Fuel companies should absorb the hike, the government needs to do its job to support us.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Alternatively, you might like to sign the following petition:

Hold an urgent inquiry into the energy crisis, and remove VAT on fuel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605609
